trans-unit.source: Represents the MSBuild task of compiling a workflow.
This class cannot be inherited.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class extends the `Task` class of Microsoft Build framework.
Methods of this class are invoked by the Microsoft Build framework to customize the build process when compiling Windows Workflow Foundation types of C# and Visual Basic projects.
It provides support for compiling .xoml files into intermediate code files (either C# or Visual Basic).
Workflows are validated before compiling.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowTask"></xref> class.
Gets and sets the name of the assembly that is built during compilation.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the name of the assembly.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this build task is currently building the workflow project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this build task is currently building the workflow project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the compilation options.
The compilation options.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow assembly will be delay signed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the assembly will be delay signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Runs the compilation of the workflow task.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Object> that is used to obtain services provided by the Visual Studio host when the compile workflow task is invoked.
The value for this property is set by the workflow project system just before compilation starts.
The <xref:System.Object> that is used to obtain services provided by Visual Studio host when the compile workflow task is invoked.
Gets or sets a string that contains all the imports directives for the compilation of the workflow.
A string that contains all the imports directives for the compilation of the workflow.
Gets a Boolean value that determines whether temporary files are to be kept.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if temporary files are to be kept; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the public/private key container used for signing the workflow assembly.
The name of the public/private key container used for signing the workflow assembly.
Gets or sets the path of the file that is used for signing the workflow assembly.
This file is usually of type .snk.
The path of the file that is used for signing the workflow assembly.
Gets or sets the Host Object in the Microsoft Build framework.
The Host Object from the Microsoft Build framework.
Gets an array of paths to output files from the workflow project being compiled.
These files are temporary files and may be removed after compilation, depending the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowTask.KeepTemporaryFiles%2A> property.
An array of paths to output files from the workflow project being compiled.
Gets or sets a string that contains the path of the directory that contains the workflow project.
A string that contains the path of the directory that contains the workflow project.
Gets or sets a string that contains the file name extension for the workflow project.
A string that contains the file name extension for the workflow project.
Gets or sets an array of paths to reference files for the workflow project being compiled.
An array of paths to reference files for the workflow project being compiled.
Gets or sets an array of paths to resource files for the workflow project being compiled.
An array of paths to resource files for the workflow project being compiled.
Gets or sets the root namespace for the workflow project being compiled.
The root namespace for the workflow project being compiled.
Gets or sets an array of paths to Visual Basic or C# files in the workflow project being compiled.
An array of paths to Visual Basic or C# files in the workflow project being compiled.
Gets or sets the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] of the current project.
The target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] of the current project.
Gets an array of paths to temporary files created by the build task for the workflow project being compiled.
An array of paths to temporary files created by the build task for the workflow project being compiled.
Gets or sets an array of paths to Workflow Markup Files for the workflow project being compiled.
An array of paths to Workflow Markup Files for the workflow project being compiled.
